name: 9x9
description: 9x9 is a cloud based video platform which powers the aggregation, hosting, management and distribution of videos to a variety of client devices including PCs, Smart Phones, Smart TVs and Tablet Devices. OCW courses can be transformed into multiple TV-like channels on 9x9, grouped according to user preferences, discovered more easily, and shared virally via social networks. 9x9 services are available for free to end users and selected non-profit organizations.
